name: Cookie Conspiracy
description:
You're playing as a little girl. She is a detective and has to solve a mysterious case.

Controls
  • Moving | WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Notebook | E, I, T or ESC
  • Write note | Shift
  • Interact | Space
Potential Bugs
  • Box can stuck in a wall
If possible, push the box from another direction, if not go into a door and come back. The room will be reseted
